description: [ 1/{n*r} ], where r = (1 + sqrt(5))/2 and {x} := x - [ x ].
comments: A024569(n) = 1 iff A078588 = 1. A024569(n) = 1 iff A089808 is not 1. Either A024569(n) or A089809(n) = 1, but not both. A024569(n) is the complement of A089809(n). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 11 2003
links: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
author: _Clark Kimberling_
